title: Hypervisorexpert till Uppsala
description:
*Här får du jobba med hypervisorer, virtualisering och Veeam-lösningar, samt ansvara för intrimning, kapacitetsplanering och säker backup/recovery. Du bidrar också med teknisk dokumentation och arkitekturbeskrivning!*
 Du kommer att bli en del av ett mindre, engagerat team som ansvarar för design, konfiguration, drift och nyinstallation av nätverkslösningar samt virtualiserade servermiljöer.
   

  

 I rollen ingå intrimning, kapacitetsplanering och att säkerställa effektiva lösningar för backup och återställning. Du kommer att arbeta både operativt och strategiskt, med fokus på att skapa stabila och säkra IT-miljöer.
   

  

 Arbetet inkluderar även framtagning av teknisk dokumentation och arkitekturbeskrivningar som stödjer såväl drift som vidareutveckling av infrastrukturen.
   

  

**För den här rollen ser vi att du har erfarenhet av:**
* Minst 5 års dokumenterad arbetslivserfarenhet av relevant område såsom VMware och Veeam inkluderat design, konfiguration och drift/intrimning av virtuella servermiljöer. I designkompetensen inräknas erfarenhet av dokumentation och arkitekturbeskrivning.
* Erfarenhet av arbete enligt agila metoder.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta teambaserat.
* Erfarenhet av Storage i virtuell miljö.


**Som person** 
 är du en lagspelare som aktivt samarbetar med dina kollegor, delar med dig av kunskaper samt stöttar teamet för att nå gemensamma mål. Du har en god kommunikativ och pedagogisk förmåga, vilket gör att du enkelt kan förklara tekniska lösningar på ett sätt som är lätt att ta till sig. Du trivs i rollen som utbildare och har förmåga att hålla workshops och utbildningar, samtidigt som du är van vid att handleda personal och bidra till kompetensutveckling inom teamet.
   

  

**Start** 
 : Omgående start med hänsyn till uppsägningstid. Uppdraget är på heltid och är tillsvidare
   

  

**Placeringsort:** 
 Uppsala
   

  

**Ansökan:** 
 Intervjuer sker löpande och tillsättning sker vid rätt match
   

  

**Vad vi står för:**
 Vi på Camai erbjuder ett av marknadens branschledande anställningsvillkor med stor frihet som ledord. Vi drivs av att hitta det bästa uppdraget för våra medarbetare. Det roligaste som finns är att hitta en perfekt matchning mellan konsult och kund. Vi vet att alla har ett drömarbete, och vi är ett tight entreprenörsdrivet team som arbetar för att se till att du tycker att det är roligt att gå till jobbet, varje dag. Vi tror att kompetenta människor dras till varandra och vill jobba med likasinnade i spännande kunduppdrag.
   

  

 Vi har en av marknadens mest förmånliga ersättningsmodell anpassad för en modern konsultorganisation med mycket frihet. Vi har helt enkelt kul tillsammans!
   

  

**Varför ska du välja oss?**
 Med många års erfarenhet i konsultbranschen har vi valt våra tre värdeord med omsorg; kommunikation, ambition och balans. För att lyckas tror vi att våra medarbetare får vara med och forma sitt arbete efter prioriteringar och intresse i livet. Med din ambition och rätt verktyg från oss ser vi till att du utvecklas och samtidigt belönas på vägen.
   

  

*Vill du vara en del av vår fortsatta tillväxt?*

title: Lösningsarkitekt inom Microsoft Azure och M365 - Castra
description:
*Vi utmanar de traditionella konsultbolagen och vi kan med stolthet säga att Castra är konsultbranschens mest utvecklande arbetsplats där allt är möjligt. Känns det här som företaget för dig så läs gärna vidare.*
**Rollen**
 I rollen som lösningsarkitekt kommer du att arbeta med spännande uppdrag hos några av Sveriges ledande företag både inom den privat och offentliga sektorn. Du kommer att designa och implementera innovativa lösningar inom hybridmolnarkitektur, identitetshantering, automatisering och molnsäkerhet. Som en nyckelspelare i att modernisera och optimera våra kunders IT-miljöer, med fokus på att skapa hållbara och säkra lösningar stödjer du verksamhetens strategiska mål.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**
* Djup teknisk kompetens inom Microsoft Azure och M365, inklusive områden som exempelvis PowerShell och Intune.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med hybridmolnlösningar, identitets- och åtkomsthantering (IAM), samt automatisering av arbetsflöden.
* Kunskaper i arkitekturramverk så som SAFe, COBIT och/eller IASA.
* Certifieringar inom Microsoft Azure.
* Erfarenhet av att leda och delta i komplexa migreringsprojekt, integrationer och modernisering av IT-infrastruktur.


 Om du trivs i en dynamisk miljö där du får möjlighet att lösa komplexa tekniska utmaningar och samtidigt påverka verksamhetens framgång – då är det dig vi söker! Skicka in din ansökning så hörs vi redan kommande vecka.
   

  

**Det bästa åt de bästa – vår personalfilosofi**
 Castra är en konsultgrupp inom IT och management. Eller ja, en elite squad kan man säga. Vi samlar de vassaste och mest erfarna konsulterna, helt enkelt för att det är hos oss de får ut max i både kapacitet och livskvalitet.
   

  

 Vi är en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser. Det låter lite skrytsamt, förlåt. Men det är faktiskt inte vi som sagt det. Castra har sedan 2017 blivit certifierad av Great Place to Work och har de senaste tre åren blivit utnämnda till en av Sveriges Bästa Arbetsplatser. Som grädde på moset är vi även Gasell- och Karriärföretag.
   

  

 På Castra tror vi på frihet, utveckling och gemenskap. Du som konsult styr själv vilka uppdrag du tar, när du jobbar, om du vill levla upp någon kompetens och hur och mycket lön och semester du tar ut. Att du får bygga din egen logga är bara ytterligare ett bevis. Trodde du det var allt? Då trodde du fel. Stöd av bra chefer, aktiviteter, kompetent och snabbfotad säljstyrka, möjlighet till delägarskap, stora möjligheter att påverka bolagets framtid och härliga kollegor – listan på vad som gör Castra till en fantastisk arbetsplats kan göras lååång. Summan av kardemumman är att hos oss är möjligheterna bra nära oändliga. Win för alla parter, säger vi.
   

  

*Castra har kontor i Göteborg, Stockholm, Eskilstuna, Malmö, Linköping, Norrköping, Örebro och Jönköping.*
 Läs mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss på castra.se/konsulterbjudande/
   

  

**Har vi lyckats väcka din nyfikenhet?**
 Sök direkt via länken eller hör av dig till Charlotta på Charlotta.Ljung@castra.se eller 072 871 63 12

title: IT Business Partner (Finance)
description:
At EasyPark, we love cities. We love them for work, for play and everything in between. That’s why our mission is to make life in cities that much easier – by taking care of the parking. With the use of technology, we break barriers, helping improve the urban experience. Our aim is to create a scenario where parking supply and driver demand are balanced not due to additional parking spots and fewer cars, but thanks to predictive technology that connects our users to available spots.
   

  

**The Role**
 We are currently looking for an IT Business Partner (Finance) to join our team based in Stockholm to become a true bridge between the business and IT, driving innovation, improving efficiency, and ultimately contributing to the overall success of the organization.
   

  

**You Will Contribute & Make An Impact Through**
* Align technology solutions with strategic business objectives
* Foster strong partnerships with business stakeholders
* Drive innovation and process improvement
* Optimize the use of technology to achieve business goals
* Empower the organization to achieve its full potential through effective technology utilization


 As an IT Business Partner at Easypark you will be responible for:
   

  

* Strategic Alignment and Partnership
+ Business Liaison: Serve as the primary point of contact between IT and assigned business units, fostering strong relationships and understanding their unique needs.
+ Strategic Planning: Collaborate with business leaders and IT teams to develop and execute IT strategies that align with overall business objectives.
+ Requirements Gathering: Elicit, analyze, and validate business requirements, translating them into clear and actionable technical specifications.
+ Business Case Development: Lead the development of robust business cases to justify IT investments and prioritize initiatives.

* Project Delivery and Execution
+ Project Management: Oversee IT projects from initiation to closure, control timely delivery, budget adherence, and stakeholder satisfaction.
+ Solution Design: Work with technical teams to design, implement, and maintain technology solutions that address business needs and drive value.
+ Change Management: Effectively manage change initiatives, minimizing disruption and maximizing adoption of new technologies.

* Continuous Improvement and Collaboration
+ Fostering a Culture of Collaboration: Promote a collaborative work environment, encouraging open communication and knowledge sharing between IT and business teams.
+ Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvement and drive initiatives to enhance efficiency and effectiveness.
+ Adaptability: Stay abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends to anticipate future business needs and proactively propose innovative solutions.

* Effective Communication
+ Stakeholder Communication: Communicate effectively with stakeholders at all levels, tailoring messages to their specific needs and understanding.
+ Progress Reporting: Provide regular updates on project status, key performance indicators, and potential risks.


**About You**
* Strong understanding of business operations and IT capabilities
* Previous Finance and ERP knowledge / experience (Netsuite)
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Proven ability to build and maintain strong relationships with stakeholders
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* Ability to audit multiple projects and priorities simultaneously (not a project manager)
* Experience in project management methodologies (e.g., Agile, Waterfall)
* Knowledge of ITIL or other IT service management frameworks
* Ability to adapt to changing priorities and business needs
* Manufacturing and supply chain knowledge would be beneficial


**Life at EasyPark**
 We are a values-driven company with an international culture and a global presence. By providing an environment with space to grow and room for autonomy, we believe in encouraging and supporting our team members to take initiatives and act outside of their comfort zone. To have an open mind and embracing change is a part of our DNA. At EasyPark we are dedicated to maintaining an open culture where the voice of each person is heard, and we play as one team across the globe. Diversity is something we celebrate and we are committed to creating an inclusive environment for everyone.

title: Finance Solution Architect
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Pharmaceutical Manufacturing
description:
**Join Cegeka Business Solutions Team** 





*At Cegeka, we are pioneers in the IT industry, delivering high quality solutions in primarily Pharma & Life Science industry, according to industry best practices.* 




  





 As we expand our team, we're dedicated to finding individuals who embody the perfect blend of competencies, character, and ambition, ensuring we continue to exceed expectations in every project we undertake. Cegeka continuously invests in talent management through clearly defined growth paths and an extensive range of training programs.
 



  





**Position overview** 




 As a Solution Architect and Business Application Consultant specializing in Finance in D365FO at Cegeka, you'll be integral to the success of the implementation lifecycle. You will be reporting to the Business Unit Lead for Cegeka Business Solutions Sweden. Your role will involve understanding our clients' Finance processes/challenges, designing innovative solutions using standard MS Dynamics 365FO features and Microsofts’ vision Modern Finance, and guiding them through seamless transitions to optimize their operations through the entire lifecycle of the implementation.
 



  





**Key responsibilities:** 



* **Client Needs Assessment** 
 : Dive deep into understanding the intricacies of our clients' finance requirements to ensure our solutions perfectly align with their objectives.
* **Solution Design** 
 : Utilize your expertise in D365FO, embracing Microsoft’s vision Modern Finance, together with our extensive processes catalogue to address client-specific finance challenges.
* **Configuration and Development** 
 : Drive the configuration and development of D365FO standard, using Cegeka industry templates and strong methodology.
* **Customer assistance** 
 : Offer unwavering support throughout the implementation process, including training key users, providing assistance, and facilitating the smooth migration of systems.
* **Post-Implementation Guidance** 
 : Provide ongoing support and guidance to clients, ensuring they achieve sustained success and maximum efficiency both before and after go-live.



  





**What are we offering:** 




 A close-knit and collaborative work culture built on trust and respect, where collaboration and personal growth are encouraged.
 


* A Comprehensive Training and personal development program, securing that you are best in class and always up to date.
* A solid salary package that matches your education and work experience. At Cegeka you are covered by a collective agreement. We also offer health care contributions, health insurance and greenbike (benefit bicycle).
* You will join a dedicated and experienced team with different competences to support you on your further journey.
* An onboarding program with an appointed buddy for your support.
* An enjoyment and motivated team that celebrates successes together, and helps you achieve your goals.
* Challenging and interesting work in an open and flexible work culture, where your opinion is valued.
* An opportunity to develop within our local, European and Global team.



  





**What you need to succeed:** 



* You have a bachelor’s or master’s degree or related experience within Finance and Business Administration.
* You have several years of experience with Microsoft Dynamics 365FO implementations or experience with other ERP systems
* Experience in Finance processes within the Pharma & Life Science industry is a plus.
* You have experience with Analysis, Solution Design, Configuration, workshop facilitation & Testing.
* You are proactive, result-driven, and take initiative. You have strong ambitions to contribute to a success story.
* You are fluent in English and Swedish



  





**About Cegeka Global** 




 Discover Cegeka, a leader driving digital transformation globally with 9000+ employees. With a diverse range of cutting-edge digital services and solutions tailored to meet evolving needs of businesses, Cegeka stands at the forefront of innovation. From cloud services to IT consulting, software development to system integration, and infrastructure management, Cegeka offers comprehensive solutions designed to drive businesses forward. Headquarters in Belgium, our reach extends globally, bringing our expertise to companies in multiple countries.
 



  





**How To Apply** 




 In this recruitment, we are collaborating with Experis. If you have any questions about the position, please feel free to contact recruitment consultant Pia Boström at 0703 14 68 66, pia.bostrom@se.experis.com
 



  





**About Cegeka Sweden** 




 Our presence in the Swedish market marks the beginning of an exciting journey where we strive to deliver high-quality services and innovative solutions that help our customers needs. We are committed to deliver personalized digital services and perfectly aligned with the unique requirements of Swedish business. With the support of our mother company in Belgium, we have access to a broad knowledge base and technical expertise that equips us to meet and exceed our customers' expectations.
 



  





 With a total of 60+ employees and offices in Stockholm, Linköping, Gävle, and Falun, we are able to empower Swedish companies with state-of-the-art IT solutions, helping them overcome challenges and achieve success efficiently. You can work from the office that is most suitable for you and your employment.
 



  





 We have nice offices with an open work environment. We work well in smaller teams and the overall feeling is very family-oriented with close cooperation. We prioritize to enjoy time with our colleagues and gathering different conferences, summer parties, Christmas parties, activities and after works.

title: Senior IT-controller till Agria
description:
*Har du stor erfarenhet av finansiell styrning och arbete med controlling av IT-verksamhet? Brinner du för att driva utveckling och med din kompetens bidra till hög kvalitet inom IT- och utveckling? Delar du dessutom vårt intresse för djur? Då kan du vara den vi söker! Välkommen med din ansökan!*
**Om jobbet**
 Agria siktar mot att bli Europas största djurförsäkringsbolag. Det innebär också en spännande utvecklingsresa mot en modern och framtidssäkrad IT.
   

  

 Som senior IT-controller har du en nyckelroll i att bidra till att våra strategiska initiativ levereras kostnadseffektivt och med största värde för affären. Du driver utvecklingen av den ekonomiska styrningen och skapar förutsättningar för optimering och styrning av it- och utvecklingsresurser och bidrar till Agrias mål att bli Europas ledande djurförsäkringsbolag!
   

  

 Du ingår i gruppen Control & Analys inom CFO-avdelningen och har ett mycket nära samarbete med Utvecklingsavdelningen
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden är:
   

  

* Utveckla och implementera väl fungerande ekonomiska processer för kontroll och styrning av IT-kostnader och investeringar där vi gått från traditionell till leanagil utveckling och DevOps-miljö
* Proaktivt analysera och verka för effektivitet inom it- och utvecklingsverksamheten
* Utforma relevanta kostnadsfördelningsmodeller och analysera ekonomiska konsekvenser av ex olika arkitekturella val
* Ta fram tydlig finansiell rapportering till ledningen och andra intressenter och underlag för strategiska beslut
* Leda plan- och prognosprocesser för utvecklingsavdelningen i nära samarbete med övriga controllers
* Samarbeta med Lean Portfolio Management och utvecklingsledningen för att optimera resursallokeringen
* Utföra kostnads-nyttoanalyser för IT-initiativ och investeringar samt ta fram underlag för aktivering och ekonomisk redovisning
* Säkerställa framtagande och uppföljning av lean business case för våra större utvecklingsinitiativ och transformationsprogram


**Vem är du?**
 För att lyckas i din roll ser vi att du:
   

  

* Har relevant akademisk examen
* Har gedigen erfarenhet av controlling av IT-verksamhet inom såväl linjeverksamhet som portfölj och transformation
* Är van att hantera stora datamängder och avancerad användning av excel
* Har erfarenhet av att driva processförbättringar inom control
* Har erfarenhet av att arbeta i lean-agila miljöer, gärna med kunskap om SAFe
* Behärskar såväl svenska som engelska väl i både tal och skrift


 Som person är du självgående och arbetar självständigt. Samtidigt trivs du med att samarbeta med andra för att uppnå gemensamma mål. Du har en stark analytisk förmåga och mycket god kommunikationsförmåga.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Välkommen till Agria, en plats där vi skapar trygghet för djur och människor. Allt vi gör, gör vi för djuren. Det genomsyrar hela vår medarbetarkultur och märks i alla beslut vi fattar. Vi tror på att människor med en genuin passion för djur är nyckeln till att förmedla vårt erbjudande och att upprätthålla våra mål, mission och löften.
   

  

 Vi vill bidra till en kreativ och lärande miljö där du som vill utveckla dig själv och verksamheten ska kunna göra det. En miljö där vi som arbetsgivare ger dig rätt stöd och ledarskap. Tillsammans skapar vi en inkluderande arbetsplats att trivas i och vi välkomnar alla, oavsett bakgrund.
   

  

 Agria växer i Europa och har idag verksamhet i Sverige, Norge, Finland, Danmark, Storbritannien, Tyskland, Frankrike och Irland. På Agria arbetar cirka 650 medarbetare. I koncernen ingår även dotterbolaget Agria Vård Guide som erbjuder digital veterinärrådgivning.
   

  

 Var med oss på resan att skapa Europas största och mest valbara djurförsäkringsbolag för att skapa trygghet för fler djur och människor.
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-05-21**

title: Chief Product Officer
description:
Greenely is on a mission to create the best customer experience for the modern energy consumer by using technology. We're now looking for an exceptional Chief Product Officer that can continue the development of one of the most beloved energy consumer platforms in the Nordics that is already used by hundreds of thousands of consumers.
   

  

**About The Job**
 This is a high-velocity, high-impact role that requires you to learn fast, adapt quickly, and deliver at pace. You’ll need to absorb technical information, think strategically, and bring a ‘get-it-done’ mindset to overcome challenges. Your work will directly shape the future experience for the modern energy consumer and drive the growth of Greenely.
   

  

 As the CPO for Greenely, you will lead the product organization by setting the overall product direction, overseeing operations, and driving major strategic initiatives. You will implement modern product practices and processes to ensure we deliver real-world value to consumers while advancing Greenely’s mission to transform energy usage.
   

  

 You’ll work with passionate engineers, product designers, and marketing professionals to develop innovative solutions that help consumers connect, control, and optimize their energy usage. Expect significant ownership, whitespace for innovation, and a fast-paced, growing environment.
   

  

**What You'll Do**
* Own and develop every step of the product development lifecycle, from ideation and discovery to delivery. Collaborate cross-functionally to ensure we ship “the right product” with strong technical foundations.
* Organize and build an exceptional product organization, mentoring and inspiring the team to grow in their roles and deliver exceptional results. Foster a culture of ownership, collaboration, and high performance.
* Define and execute Greenely’s product strategy, ensuring alignment with company goals and customer needs. Identify new opportunities, particularly across Growth, Connectivity, and Energy Optimization, and partner with stakeholders to expand the customer experience.
* Ensure that new initiatives are prioritized effectively using modern frameworks. Balance customer discovery with technical execution to deliver products that resonate with users.
* Develop key metrics and KPIs to measure product success and continuously optimize customer experience, product quality, and commercial outcomes using data-driven insights.
* Collaborate closely with the CTO and engineering teams to ensure the product vision and roadmap align with scalable, robust technical foundations.
* Drive experimentation methodologies and technical innovation across product and engineering teams.
* Roll out products effectively by collaborating with marketing, sales, and customer support teams to enable successful launches, adoption, and customer education.


**What You Can Expect**
* Insane amounts of ownership. You’ll take full responsibility for the product direction and success.
* The chance to work with engineers and designers who care deeply about creating real-world impact.
* Whitespace to explore new directions and innovations in a rapidly growing company.


**What You Bring**
* Strong experience in a senior product leadership role, owning the entire product lifecycle and scaling complex products.
* Strong technical abilities with a proven ability to work on complex and technical products.
* Experience in the energy space (EVs, battery tech, or virtual power plants) is a strong plus, but equivalent experience in similarly complex, consumer-facing domains is welcomed.
* A scrappy, entrepreneurial approach with a relentless focus on shipping value to customers.
* Demonstrated ability to use data, customer insights, and experimentation to inform product decisions.
* Experience leading high-performing product teams and mentoring team members to grow their capabilities and careers.
* A deep motivation for the energy sector and a passion for enabling sustainability and innovation.
* The ability to think strategically while driving execution with attention to detail in a very fast-paced environment.


**What You Are Offered Besides Competitive Salary**
* Being able to directly influence and develop one of the most beloved consumer energy platforms in the Nordics used by hundreds of thousands of consumers.
* Ability to directly contribute to a sustainable energy future to help mitigate climate change.
* Be part of a scale-up company with an entrepreneurial spirit that is growing rapidly.
* Employee stock options.
* Occupational Pension.
* Additional health insurance.
* Healthcare allowance as well as the right to exercise during working hours.
* Flexible work-hours.
* Talented and super friendly co-workers.


 WE ARE
 **bold and push the limit.**
 WE BELIEVE THAT
 **f** 
****ast is better than slow.****
 WE
 **t** 
******hink like owners.******
 WE
 ****lead with knowledge.****

title: Pre-Sales Partner
description:
**We’re Hiring: Dynamic PSIM Pre-Sales Partner** 




 Do you enjoy working with technology and helping customers succeed?
 



 Do you thrive in dynamic environments where every conversation is a chance to shape the future?
 



 Join us as our Dynamic
 **PSIM Pre-Sales Partner** 
 and become a driving force in revolutionizing physical security through cutting-edge PSIM solutions.
 



  





**What You’ll Do:** 




 • Lead technical pre-sales engagements with precision and passion
 



 • Translate complex needs into powerful solution designs
 



 • Collaborate with sales, product, and R&D teams to deliver unmatched value
 



 • Influence enterprise-level security strategies across industries
 



**Who You Are:** 




 • Experienced in PSIM or physical security systems
 



 • Strategic thinker with hands-on technical know-how
 



 • A proactive partner
 



 This is not just a role – it’s your chance to
 **build a new domain** 
 , shape go-to-market strategies, and leave your mark in a growing global company.
 



**Qualifications** 




 · A minimum of 5 years of experience in PSIM and/or IBMS presale support is required.
 



 Residence in Sweden - mandatory
 



 · Fluency in English and Swedish, demonstrating fluency and accuracy in complex technical communication.
 



 · Experience with fire detection is a plus.
 



 · Customer-focused mindset with a passion for technology.
 



 ·Strong organizational abilities to manage multiple projects simultaneously.
 



 · Exceptional attention to detail and problem-solving skills focused on outcomes.
 



 · Self-driven and capable of rapid learning while working independently.
 



 · Willingness to travel up to 50%.
 



 Ready to step into a pivotal role and make an impact from day one?
 



  





 #Opportunity #CareerGrowth #PSIM #IBMS #IoT #FireDetection #SmartFactory #SmartCities

title: Experienced data solution professional – in Stockholm or Gothenburg
description:
Do you want to be a part of shaping Valcon as a premium technology consulting firm in Sweden? Do you have 8 years of experience in consulting and/or other relevant roles? And are you passionate about creating lasting results for clients? Then you could be our new colleague.
   

  

 Valcon is a leading European management consulting firm with Scandinavian roots and an informal, inclusive culture. With offices in the Netherlands, Denmark, the UK, Sweden, Germany, Croatia and Serbia, we strive to connect strategy with operations through innovative technology and data. We are looking for an experienced and curious individual who values collaboration and thrives in dynamic, diverse environments.
   

  

**Experience**
* 8 years of experience in data consulting or other relevant roles
* Hands-on expertise
* Data Bricks, Microsoft Fabric
* A relevant Master degree


**Keywords**
* Creating lasting results
* Commercial mindset


**Location** 
 : Sweden
   

  

**What You Will Do**
 As a experienced data solution professional at Valcon, you will:
   

  

* Be part of the digital advisory team in one of the fastest-growing consultancies in Europe
* Contribute to our exciting growth journey while contributing to our expanding presence in the Swedish market
* Work side by side with skilled and experienced colleagues in diverse and international teams, tackling challenges from digital strategies to IT implementations
* Solve complex problems for Swedish and international companies across industries, guiding them to unlock the full potential of their data
* Help clients become more data-driven, comply with laws and regulations regarding their data and help them get the most value out of their data


**What We Are Looking For**
 To thrive in this role, you should be able to say yes to some or all of the following:
   

  

* 8 years of experience in data consulting or other relevant roles
* A relevant Master’s degree
* A strong understanding of industry standards, best practices and emerging trends in data, such as data governance, engineering, AI, and machine learning
* Hands-on expertise in designing scalable, secure and high-performing data/technical solutions aligned with client needs
* Proficiency in leading-edge tools and platforms such as Databricks, Celonis, Microsoft Fabric and the broader Azure ecosystem specialising in data and AI solutions
* Experience in data architecture, including data modelling and warehousing
* A commercial mindset with a proven track record in uncovering growth opportunities, building strong client relationships and selling complex technical assignments
* A thoughtful approach to leadership with the ability to guide and mentor project teams effectively
* Relevant certifications in IT management, project management (e.g., PMP) and digital transformation (e.g., CDT). ITIL, Microsoft and Cloud are a plus
* Excellent communication and presentation skills in both Swedish and English with the ability to translate technical concepts for a variety of stakeholders


**We offer you**
 At Valcon, we believe in fostering a diverse and inclusive environment where everyone feels valued and respected. We offer:
   

  

* A diverse and international workplace with an informal culture and a flat hierarchy
* The opportunity to collaborate across business areas and levels and work closely with some of the most talented and experienced consultants in the industry
* A focus on professional and personal growth, supported by our value-driven culture, which is grounded in Integrity, Together, Joy, Curious, and Can Do
* Enhanced benefits and support throughout all life stages, including maternity, paternity and adoption leave, health and well-being initiatives and resources for navigating significant life transitions
* A welcoming office environment in either Stockholm (Kungsgatan 9) or Gothenburg (Kungsportsavenyen 21)


 We care deeply about results, but we care even more about people. At Valcon, you’ll find a workplace that values excellence and ingenuity while keeping grounded in the reality of delivering lasting results for our clients.
   

  

**Application**
 Does this sound like the right opportunity for you? If so, we encourage you to apply below. For any questions or additional information, feel free to reach out to [email protected].
   

  

 We are reviewing applications and conducting interviews on an ongoing basis, so please send us your application as soon as possible.

title: Lösningsarkitekt inom Microsoft Azure och M365
description:
*Vi utmanar de traditionella konsultbolagen och vi kan med stolthet säga att Castra är konsultbranschens mest utvecklande arbetsplats där allt är möjligt. Känns det här som företaget för dig så läs gärna vidare.* 




**Rollen**




 I rollen som lösningsarkitekt kommer du att arbeta med spännande uppdrag hos några av Sveriges ledande företag både inom den privat och offentliga sektorn. Du kommer att designa och implementera innovativa lösningar inom hybridmolnarkitektur, identitetshantering, automatisering och molnsäkerhet. Som en nyckelspelare i att modernisera och optimera våra kunders IT-miljöer, med fokus på att skapa hållbara och säkra lösningar stödjer du verksamhetens strategiska mål.
 



**Vi söker dig som har:** 



* Djup teknisk kompetens inom Microsoft Azure och M365, inklusive områden som exempelvis PowerShell och Intune.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med hybridmolnlösningar, identitets- och åtkomsthantering (IAM), samt automatisering av arbetsflöden.
* Kunskaper i arkitekturramverk så som SAFe, COBIT och/eller  IASA.
* Certifieringar inom Microsoft Azure.
* Erfarenhet av att leda och delta i komplexa migreringsprojekt, integrationer och modernisering av IT-infrastruktur.



  

 Om du trivs i en dynamisk miljö där du får möjlighet att lösa komplexa tekniska utmaningar och samtidigt påverka verksamhetens framgång – då är det dig vi söker! Skicka in din ansökning så hörs vi redan kommande vecka. 
   

  

**Det bästa åt de bästa – vår personalfilosofi**




 Castra är en konsultgrupp inom IT och management. Eller ja, en elite squad kan man säga. Vi samlar de vassaste och mest erfarna konsulterna, helt enkelt för att det är hos oss de får ut max i både kapacitet och livskvalitet.
 



 Vi är en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser. Det låter lite skrytsamt, förlåt. Men det är faktiskt inte vi som sagt det. Castra har sedan 2017 blivit certifierad av Great Place to Work och har de senaste tre åren blivit utnämnda till en av Sveriges Bästa Arbetsplatser. Som grädde på moset är vi även Gasell- och Karriärföretag.
 



 På Castra tror vi på frihet, utveckling och gemenskap. Du som konsult styr själv vilka uppdrag du tar, när du jobbar, om du vill levla upp någon kompetens och hur och mycket lön och semester du tar ut. Att du får bygga din egen logga är bara ytterligare ett bevis. Trodde du det var allt? Då trodde du fel. Stöd av bra chefer, aktiviteter, kompetent och snabbfotad säljstyrka, möjlighet till delägarskap, stora möjligheter att påverka bolagets framtid och härliga kollegor – listan på vad som gör Castra till en fantastisk arbetsplats kan göras lååång. Summan av kardemumman är att hos oss är möjligheterna bra nära oändliga. Win för alla parter, säger vi.
 



*Castra har kontor i Göteborg, Stockholm, Eskilstuna, Malmö, Linköping, Norrköping, Örebro och Jönköping.* 




 Läs mer om hur det är att jobba hos oss på castra.se/konsulterbjudande/
 



  

**Har vi lyckats väcka din nyfikenhet?** 




 Sök direkt via länken eller hör av dig till Charlotta på Charlotta.Ljung@castra.se eller 072 871 63 12

title: Seniora nätverkskonsulter
description:
Vill du använda din expertis för att forma framtidens digitala landskap och stödja organisationer i deras utvecklingsresa? Har du arbetat med lösningar från Cisco under en längre tid i din karriär? Just nu söker vi på Atea i Stockholm flera seniora nätverkskonsulter. Med din passion skapar du tillsammans med dina kollegor, kunder och leverantörer The Place To Be - stället där alla växer och trivs. Ta chansen att utvecklas både professionellt och som människa med oss!
 



  





**Din roll** 




 I rollen som senior nätverkskonsult får du vara involverad i hela kedjan från analys till design, implementation, livscykelhantering, förvaltning till support på både nya kunder och på våra existerande avtalskunder och driftskunder. Du får möjligheten att leda och delta i olika implementationsprojekt, där du hjälper våra kunder att modernisera, förbättra och effektivisera deras kommunikationslösningar. Många av våra kunder är inne i sin resa mot molnet och en alltmer hybrid vardag där du kommer spela en viktig roll i att proaktivt kunna identifiera och driva initiativ med syfte för att utveckla våra kunders befintliga tjänster och lösningar.
 



  





 I rollen kommer du att arbeta med både stora och små kunder inom offentlig och privat sektor och som senior konsult får du även bidra internt med tjänsteutveckling inom området. Du kommer att tillhöra vårt Hybrid Platforms-team där vi arbetar med datacenter- och nätverksteknik i traditionell infrastrukturen och i framtidens lösningar.
 



  





**Ditt team** 




 Ditt team består av 20-talet kollegor tillika tekniska experter med fokus på nätverksteknik. Team består av experter inom nätverksteknik, vilket skapar en dynamisk och stödjande miljö där vi lär av varandra och växer tillsammans. Teamet är lokalt placerat med bas i Stockholm men du ges dessutom möjligheten till att arbeta på både nationell och global nivå på andra spännande projekt. Din närmsta chef är Joakim Nildén - en erfaren konsultchef som finns där för stöttning längs vägens gång. För honom är det viktigt att man har det roligt på jobbet och att känna sig som en del av gemenskapen på Atea, fastän du är konsult och tillbringar mycket tid ute hos kund.
 



  





**Vad vi söker hos dig** 




 Vi värdesätter dina personliga egenskaper och ser att du trivs med att arbeta både självständigt och i grupp. Din förmåga att ta initiativ och agera proaktivt är något vi uppskattar högt. Du tar ansvar för dina uppgifter, strukturerar ditt arbete självständigt och driver vidare processer. Med din analytiska förmåga kan du bryta ner problem och se sammanhang, analysera och prioritera rätt frågor.
 



  





 För att lyckas i tjänsten som senior nätverkskonsult ser vi att du besitter följande:
 


* Har gedigen erfarenhet och har arbetat flertalet år med Cisco inom routing/switching/trådlöst/firewalls
* Obehindrad i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
* B-körkort



  





 Meriterande:
 


* Intresse för scripting och programmering
* Erfarenhet av Automatisering i datacenter och nätverk som byggts på Ciscos ACI-, VXLAN- och SD-WAN-teknik
* Certifieringar som Cisco CCNP och/eller CCIE
* Erfarenhet och certifieringar av liknande teknik med Fortinet-, Aruba- & VMwares produkter
* Erfarenhet av Cloud networking



  





**Vårt löfte till dig** 




 Hos oss får du vara med att bidra till ett smartare, effektivare och mer hållbart samhälle. Med fokus på utveckling, laganda och personligt ansvarstagande ser vi till att göra skillnad. Vi uppmuntrar och stöttar varandra, och tar vara på våra individuella förmågor, perspektiv och erfarenheter. Det är därför du är viktig för oss. För att du är du, för att du är nyfiken och för att du vill växa professionellt - och som människa. Tillsammans skapar vi laget som bygger Sverige med it.
 



  





**Kontakt & mer information** 




 Har du frågor om tjänsten är du varmt välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef, Joakim Nildén, via joakim.nilden@atea.se. Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, ansök därmed redan idag!
 



  





 Som en del i vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår även slutkandidater en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om dig som vår framtida medarbetare.
 



  





 Atea vill vara The Place To Be, den självklara platsen, för alla människor då vi värdesätter och jobbar aktivt med mångfald och inkludering.
 



 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan till oss!
 



**Följ oss i sociala medier**

title: ServiceNow solution consultant - Stockholm
description:
Would you like to join the leading business technology company in the Nordics? Do you speak both business and technology fluently? If yes, keep reading!
   

  

 Sofigate is growing fast and we’re looking for an experienced
 **ServiceNow solution consultant** 
 to join our Platforms business stream. We’re looking for someone with a growth mindset and passion for how technology and business are changing the world.
   

  

 Within the Platforms business stream we collaborate with our customers in finding the next innovative solution that will support the customer to achieve better business results. Time to value is what matters for our customers and for us! Modern ways of working, leveraging lates techniques focusing on customer needs is part of our DNA when we make sure our customers get the most out of their investments.
   

  

**Who are we looking for?**
 We're seeking a dynamic ServiceNow expert who excels in deciphering client business goals and effortlessly translates them into precise technical requirements. Your expertise spans Agile frameworks, DevOps models, and a proven track record with POC approaches. Beyond that, you bring valuable experience seamlessly navigating both traditional waterfall methods and cutting-edge methodologies.
   

  

 Your skills align perfectly with our core values, Dare, Care and Grow: daring to innovate, caring for impactful solutions, and a commitment to continual growth. Join us in shaping the future of ServiceNow development with a team that values your unique blend of technical prowess and a forward-thinking mindset.
   

  

 What we expect:
   

  

* You have a few years of experience of ServiceNow and potentially other cloud based solutions
* You have both good communication and technical skills, with facilitating abilities.
* You are passionate about technology, and what innovative solutions can do for organizations. You are fluent in both Swedish and English.
* Expertise with HR tech and / or background in HR is considered a plus


**What’s in it for you?**
 As a Sofigator, you get the opportunity to work with knowledgeable and driven colleagues, develop and challenge yourself and create sustainable value for our customers. We have an international, vibrant and fun culture with great openness and flexibility. We value every Sofigator and strive to build a diverse, equal, and inclusive workplace where everyone’s voice is heard, and where everyone can become the best versions of themselves. We value a healthy work life balance and support you in maintaining it.
   

  

 Growth is not just a corporate thing for us – it is personal. There is so much to explore and learn within our community, and together with our customers, that having a bit of fun is unavoidable.
   

  

 We do not leave the future up to chance. We take ownership of it. You can, too. Own your future!
   

  

**We would like to hear from you**
 If you want to join our journey to dare, care and grow together with our clients and fellow Sofigators, we are eager to hear more from you. Please, tell us more about your background, competences and your motivation to be part of our growth story.
   

  

 If you have any questions please contact Robert Lingemark, Business Lead Platforms robert.lingemark@sofigate.com
   

  

**About Sofigate**
*We change the way how business and technology leaders co-create business technology capabilities and lead digital transformation. Our 700+ certified Business Technology experts in Finland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway,* 
 Hungary and Poland help you be at ease with the speed of change.
   

  

 By combining our transformation expertise with low/no-code platforms and generative AI, we ensure a faster time-to-value for our customers.
   

  

 We do not leave the future up to chance. We take ownership of it. You can, too.

title: Konsultchef för IT-projektledare
description:
Vill du vara med och bidra hos världens mest hållbara bolag inom it-tjänster och leda en konsultgrupp inom området? Älskar du att bygga kundrelationer och är en affärsinriktad och coachande ledare som finner drivkraft i att aktivt skapa förutsättningar för våra medarbetare att utvecklas?
 



  





 Just nu söker vi en konsultchef till vårt kontor i Stockholm för att leda en konsultgrupp med projektledare. Missa inte denna spännande möjlighet att följa med på den digitala resan tillsammans med oss!
 



  





**Din roll** 




 I rollen som Konsultchef på Atea kommer du att arbeta som ledare och coach för ditt lag. Vår styrka är våra medarbetare och du blir en viktig pusselbit i detta där du tillsammans med dina medarbetare hittar former för att stötta och utveckla dem. Som konsultchef blir en del av vår fortsatta utveckling och tillväxt genom att driva försäljningen av konsulttjänster inom ditt område, där du säkerställer en god beläggningsgrad och arbetar aktivt för att hitta nya uppdrag och rekrytera konsulter till ditt team.
 



  





 En vardag som konsultchef för våra projektledare innehåller kundmöten och du skapar förutsättningar för att våra konsulter ska lyckas i sina roller. I ditt dagliga arbete samverkar du ofta med konsultchefskollegor i hela landet, våra kundansvariga säljare, specialistsäljare och vår leveransorganisation. Det kräver att du är en lagspelare som tror på att gott samarbete är nyckeln till framgång.
 



  





 I rollen blir du en del av Ateas affärsområde Information Management som omfattar Digital Transformation, Informations & Cybersäkerhet och AI & Analytics. Du kommer att ha ett finansiellt ansvar för din grupp samtidigt som du ingår i den regionala ledningsgruppen för Information Management och rapporterar till affärsområdeschef, Hans Gustafsson.
 



  





**Vem är du?** 




 Vi söker dig som har ett stort affärsfokus och kundengagemang, där du drivs av att skapa långsiktiga relationer. Du är en naturlig ledare som vill vara med och bygga och utveckla ditt team och vår affär inom området. Du är ansvarstagande, strukturerad och med hög drivkraft driver du ditt arbete framåt och dina arbetsuppgifter i mål. Med din strategiska förmåga och helhetstänk ser du sakers långsiktiga betydelse och vidare konsekvenser. Kort och gott är du den stjärna vi vill ha i vårt lag och den vi vill bygga vår framtid tillsammans med!
 



  





 För rollen som Konsultchef för it-projektledare ser vi att du har med dig:
 


* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av ledarrollen med en förmåga att inspirera, motivera och utveckla ditt team
* Erfarenhet och förståelse för projektledning, både traditionell projektmetodik och agila metoder
* God förmåga att bygga starka och långsiktiga relationer med både kunder, partners, kollegor och kandidater
* Erfarenhet av försäljning, gärna i form av att sälja in konsulter, konsulttjänster, löpande teamleveranser och uppdrag/projekt hos kunder
* God förståelse för ekonomi och affärer
* Erfarenhet av rekrytering
* Obehindrad i svenska och engelska i tal och skrift
* B-körkort



  





**Atea vill ha branschens bästa ledare** 




  





**Ledaruppdraget** 




 Som ledare på Atea är du en nyckelperson i vårt gemensamma arbete för att stärka medarbetarskapet, ledarskapet och företaget. Ledaruppdraget på Atea innebär att frigöra potentialen hos individen och gruppen, att samarbeta som ONE med hela Ateas bästa i åtanke och att utveckla vår affär för ökat kundvärde. Som ledare på Atea är du en sann förebild som lever vår kultur och våra värderingar och har modet att utmana dig själv och dina egna sanningar.
 



  





**Ledarakademin** 




 Vi erbjuder alla med en formell chefsroll ett skräddarsytt ledarskapsprogram anpassat utifrån din ledarerfarenhet som ger dig möjlighet att utvecklas. Vi tror på att investera i våra medarbetare och ge dem rätt verktyg för att fortsätta växa och utvecklas som ledare. Inom vår interna ledarakademi samlar vi vårt erbjudande av lärande och kompetensutveckling inom ledarskap - längre program, kortare insatser och regelbunden inspiration.
 



  





**Kontakt & mer information** 




 Vi genomför löpande urval och skicka därför in din ansökan redan idag! Vid eventuella frågor om tjänsten är du varmt välkommen att kontakta, Hans Gustafsson, Affärsområdeschef Hybrid Platforms, via hans.h.gustafsson@atea.se.
 



 Som en kvalitativ del i vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår slutkandidater personlighetstest, färdighetstest samt en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om dig som vår framtida medarbetare.
 



 Atea vill vara The Place To Be, den självklara platsen, för alla människor då vi värdesätter och jobbar aktivt med mångfald och inkludering.
 



  





**Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!** 




*Den här rekryteringsprocessen hanteras av oss på Atea och vi undanber oss därför alla samtal och eventuella förslag från rekryterings- och bemanningsföretag.* 




**Följ oss i sociala medier**

title: Lösningsarkitekt inom mjukvaruutveckling
description:
*Vill du ta ditt konsultande till nästa nivå hos en av Sveriges bästa arbetsgivare? Vi vet vad du tänker. Du har hört det förut. Men tro oss, det har du inte. Vårt körsbär på konsulttårtan är något annat. Sök jobbet och smaka själv!* 




**Rollen** 




 Som Lösningsarkitekt inom mjukvaruutveckling kommer du att inneha en central roll i att definiera och skapa övergripande tekniska lösningar för komplexa mjukvaruprojekt hos våra kunder. Du kommer att arbeta nära företagets ledning och teknikteam för att utforma arkitekturen och säkerställa att mjukvarusystemen uppfyller företagets strategiska mål och tekniska krav. Du kommeratt säkerställa att tekniska lösningar stödjer företagets mål och att systemarkitekturen är stabil, skalbar och säker. 
 



**Erfarenhet** 




 Du har en stark bakgrund inom mjukvaruutveckling samt arkitekturarbete i agila utvecklingsprocesser och har fördelaktigt moderniserat mjukvarulösningar förr.
 



  Vi ser även att du har: 
   




* Bakgrund inom utvecklin med erfarenhet av exempelvis Java, C#/.Net, Python samt diverse ramverk
* Förmåga att förstå och översätta företagets strategiska mål till tekniska krav och lösningar.
* Design av systemarkitekturer med hänsyn till skalbarhet, prestanda och säkerhet
* Skapande av tekniska specifikationer och arkitekturdokumentation.
* Erfarenhet av molnbaserad arkitektur och tjänster som AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud.
* Kunskap containerteknik som Docker och Kubernetes



 Därtill är det av stor vikt att du besitter goda kommunikationsfärdigeter då arbetet ske i nära samverkan med såväl teknikteam som intressenter. Vi ser även att du är genuint intresserad av att upprätthållande kunskap om den senaste teknikutvecklingen inom mjukvaruutveckling och arkitektur.
 



 Låter detta som du? Hör av dig så tar vi ett möte i veckan!

Castra har sedan 2017 blivit certifierad av Great Place to Work och har de senaste tre åren blivit utnämnda till en av Sveriges Bästa Arbetsplatser. Som grädde på moset är vi även Gasell- och Karriärföretag.
 



 På Castra tror vi på frihet, utveckling och gemenskap. Du som konsult styr själv vilka uppdrag du tar, när du jobbar, om du vill levla upp någon kompetens och hur och mycket lön och semester du tar ut. Att du får bygga din egen logga är bara ytterligare ett bevis. Trodde du det var allt? Då trodde du fel. Stöd av bra chefer, aktiviteter, kompetent och snabbfotad säljstyrka, möjlighet till delägarskap, stora möjligheter att påverka bolagets framtid och härliga kollegor – listan på vad som gör Castra till en fantastisk arbetsplats kan göras lååång. Summan av kardemumman är att hos oss är möjligheterna bra nära oändliga. Win för alla parter, säger vi.

title: Campaign analyst & project lead
company_industry: Financial Services and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
**Job Description**
**Campaign analyst & project lead**
**About The Role**
 As a Campaign and Project Lead, you will be part of the Commercial Excellence Team within Danske Bank's Business Customer unit as part of the Nordic Analytic and Insights Team. In this role, you will manage and execute inbound, outbound and marketing campaigns tailored for our Business Customers, ensuring alignment with commercial strategies across all Nordic countries. You will collaborate closely with stakeholders in the bank’s Business Customers unit, which serves over 200,000 small and mid-sized corporates across various market areas.
   

  

 Additionally, you will be responsible for leading our weekly sprints, allocate tasks, and ensure effective capacity planning. Ensure a great workload balance and identifying potential risks and delays.
   

  

 In this position, you can expect to fully utilise your planning management and analytical skills. While much of the work involves collaboration, you should also be comfortable and effective working independently.
   

  

 We are seeking a candidate based in Denmark, Norway, Sweden or Finland, who will report to the Head of Analytics & Insights.
   

  

**Qualifications And Requirements**
 You have a curious mindset to challenge status quo and bring positive energy to the team with a can-do attitude. As a Campaign analyst & project leadyour main responsibilities will be:
   

  

* Responsible for our weekly sprints, distribution of tasks and capacity planning.
* Set up target groups for inbound, outbound and digital campaigns (Marketing Automation).
* Extracting and processing data to define relevant target groups.
* Execute campaigns in SAS360, the current tool used by Danske Bank, with a transition to a new marketing tool expected in 2026.
* Close collaboration with Marketing and Commercial Planners.


 You are required to have:
   

  

* Proficiency in English, with strong language and writing skills.
* Hands on experience with Marketing Analytics tools and execution of digital campaigns (e.g. emails).
* A commercial mindset with solid analytical skills and a structured, data-driven approach.
* Experience with sprint and project management tools.
* Demonstrate a high work ethic with the ability to maintain an overview and effectively manage multiple tasks, projects, or dialogues simultaneously.
* Strong communication skills.


 It’s also nice if you have:
   

  

* Experience with analytics and Marketing analytics tools such as SAS360 or Adobe.
* B2B understanding.
* Experience in the Banking industry.
* Experience working in an agile set-up with remote team members.


 The ideal candidate has experience working with sprint and hands on experience with CRM campaigns from a former position. Also, we’re looking for great communication skills to effectively engage with stakeholders at Danske Bank.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 We offer a dynamic and supportive work environment where you can thrive both personally and professionally. You'll be part of a team of ambitious and sociable colleagues who are passionate about what they do, making for a fun and engaging workplace. We believe in empowering our employees by providing autonomy in their roles, allowing you to take initiative and make meaningful contributions. Additionally, we are committed to fostering a culture of continuous learning and development, ensuring you have the resources and opportunities to grow your career.
   

  

**Contact**
 If you have questions, please do not hesitate to contact Louise Nørsten, Head of Business Customers Analytics & Insights on +45 22 26 49 38.
   

  

 #FI #DK #NO #SE
   

  

**About Us**
 Danske Bank er en nordisk bank med tætte forbindelser til resten af verden. Vi har i 150 år støttet mennesker og virksomheder med at forløse deres potentiale. En karriere hos os er en mulighed for at blive en del af et fællesskab med 22.000 kolleger og en virksomhedskultur med fokus på Team Up, Own It og Be Open. Vi er begyndt på en fælles rejse, som skal gøre Danske Bank til en bedre bank. For vores kunder, vores medarbejdere og vores samfund.

title: Transformation Consultant in Stockholm
description:
Join the leading Business Technology company in the Nordics!
   

  

 We at Sofigate are on a growth journey and we’re looking for a transformation consultant to join our team of 800+ business technology transformation professionals. We’re looking for someone with a growth mindset, and a genuine interest in how technology and business together can create value.
   

  

**What’s in it for you?**
 Want to work with world-leading platforms, proven concepts and a team of best-in-business experts? You’re in the right place with us. You’ll get to work with purposeful projects where you really make a difference – our customers include organizations like Skanska, Arbetsförmedlingen and UN Women.
   

  

 We support your goals by helping you shape your career and skills. We invest in our people’s continuous development, with a wide variety of internal trainings, certifications, and our internal Academy. You always have the best tools at hand – the latest addition to our toolbox is generative AI, which is available for all our employees. And you always have your skilled colleagues to support and share knowledge with you.
   

  

 The beauty of our work is the variety of it: whenever you feel like you want something new, you can look for a new assignment or role, or learn new skills. Keep in mind that we are constantly developing and improving our processes, and looking for talent who want to develop the community further.
   

  

**Who are we looking for?**
 We're looking for someone who is business-oriented and has the ability to understand how business translates into digital and technical capabilities and solutions. You are a problem-solver who’s used to fast-paced work, and have knowledge on working with different delivery models and frameworks, like
 *agile, waterfall, portfolio management, demand planning, service mgmt.* 
 etc.
   

  

 We strongly encourage applicants with experience leveraging AI in transformation work to apply. Whether it’s AI-driven analytics, automation, decision augmentation, or AI-powered business transformation, we believe AI is redefining the way businesses evolve. If you have hands-on experience utilizing AI to drive meaningful change, we’d love to hear how you can bring this capability into our customer projects!
   

  

 You’ll work in varied customer assignments as a project manager, scrum master or business developer. You have a track-record of getting from point A to B in a systematic way. As we have our proven concepts available and we develop them all the time, we’re looking for someone who’s willing to learn continuously, systematically, and enthusiastically. We hope you are also curious about the story and the people behind the project.
   

  

 We value experience, but more importantly, we value the right attitude. You will succeed with us if you:
   

  

* have a natural way of building customer relations and recognize sales opportunities
* have 3-5 years of relevant work experience, especially as a management consultant within IT
* have hands-on experience in one or more of the following subjects: IT strategy, digital transformation, organization design, agile transformation, cloud technologies, enterprise architecture, sourcing and vendor management, analytics and business intelligence
* have excellent communication and coaching skills in both Swedish and English
* thrive in a high-energy and team-oriented environment
* Have a great sense of humor – we like to have fun while we work


**Take ownership of your work. Own your future**
 As a Sofigator, you get the opportunity to work with skilled and driven colleagues, develop and challenge yourself and create sustainable value for our customers. We have an international and vibrant culture with great openness and flexibility. We value every Sofigator and strive to build a diverse, equal, and inclusive workplace where everyone’s voice is heard, and where everyone can become the best version of themselves. We value a healthy work-life balance and support you in maintaining it.
   

  

 Growth is not just a corporate thing for us – it is personal. There is so much to explore and learn within our community, and together with our customers, that having a bit of fun is unavoidable.
   

  

**We would like to hear from you**
 If you’re eager to dare, care and grow together with us, we are eager to hear more from you. Tell us more about your background, competences and your motivation to be part of our growth story.
   

  

 Want to know more about this role? Don’t hesitate to contact Josefin Ackrell [josefin.ackrell at sofigate.com]
   

  

**About Sofigate**
*We change the way how business and technology leaders co-create business technology capabilities and lead digital transformation. Our 700+ certified Business Technology experts in Finland, Sweden, Denmark, Norway,* 
 Hungary and Poland help you be at ease with the speed of change.
   

  

 By combining our transformation expertise with low/no-code platforms and generative AI, we ensure a faster time-to-value for our customers.
   

  

 We do not leave the future up to chance. We take ownership of it. You can, too.

title: Senior OT Security Consultant
description:
**About Us**
 We are the independent expert in assurance and risk management. Driven by our purpose, to safeguard life, property, and the environment, we empower our customers and their stakeholders with facts and reliable insights so that critical decisions can be made with confidence.
   

  

 As a trusted voice for many of the world’s most successful organizations, we use our knowledge to advance safety and performance, set industry benchmarks, and inspire and invent solutions to tackle global transformations.
   

  

**About The Accelerator**
 We rapidly nurture successful businesses and services that will shape the future of assurance. The Accelerator operates a portfolio of units undergoing significant growth, chiefly through acquisitions and partnerships. The Accelerator acts as a greenhouse for a strategically selected portfolio of businesses, each of which serves different industries and markets. The portfolio benefits from dedicated support to rapidly grow through organic means, as well as through acquisitions and partnerships. Three business units were housed in the Accelerator in 2022: Cyber Security, Digital Health, and Inspection.
   

  

**About The Role**
 DNV has significant ambitions to grow the Cyber Security unit in the coming years. Building on our success and strengths in the Nordics and internationally we will make a global impact on safeguarding life, property and the environment.
   

  

 We are currently looking for talented
 **Senior OT Security Consultants** 
 to join our growing Industrial & OT Cyber Security unit. This team provides cyber security assessments, technical verification and advisory services both onshore and offshore. You will be working on exciting customer projects in key industries including maritime, oil and gas, renewables, utilities and others.
   

  

 This role will offer you the opportunity to work alongside some of the most experienced specialists in the Industrial cyber security field. We aim to provide you with a fast-paced career that brings you opportunities to develop your competencies rapidly. We will invest in your career development, offering in-depth training and the chance to participate in industry-leading courses and projects.
   

  

**You will be based at one of our DNV offices in The Netherlands, Germany or Sweden.**
**Job Requirements**
* Experience with operational technologies such as Remote Terminal Units (RTUs), Programmable Logic Controllers (PLCs), Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition (SCADA software, and Distributed Control Systems (DCS) and SIS
* Experience with major industrial systems such as Emerson, Yokogawa, Honeywell, GE, ABB, Siemens etc.
* Fundamental understanding of IT and OT network communication protocols (For example: TCP/IP, UDP, OPC, IEC 101/104, Modbus, IEC 61850, WirelessHART, ISA100
* Active participation in design concepts and implementation strategies for various SIS, PLC and DCS systems to guarantee practical implementation of security standards
* Understanding of contemporary and legacy security technologies used within a particular domain, such as Firewalls, IDS/IPS, Diodes, SIEM
* Strong knowledge of networking technology (e.g. routers, switches, firewalls)
* Comprehend the customer’s business environment and suggest fit for OT security solutions
* Background in a CNI domain, e.g. transport, energy, utilities, defense or other heavy industry


**For More Information About The Position, Please Contact**
 Head of unit, Industrial and OT systems, Svante Einarsson at svante.einarsson@dnv.com
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

**What We Offer**
* Strong company culture with an emphasis on competence development
* Great colleagues who value teamwork and support
* International working environment
* Exciting projects within critical sectors locally and internationally
* Competitive terms and conditions
* Flexible working hours and a focus on work/life balance
* Social events, sports and team building activities


 Equal Opportunity Statement: DNV is an Equal Opportunity Employer and gives consideration for employment to qualified applicants without regard to gender, religion, race, national or ethnic origin, cultural background, social group, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, marital status, age or political opinion. Diversity is fundamental to our culture and we invite you to be part of this diversity.
   

  

**About You**
**What You Bring:**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or a related technical field
* Minimum of 10+ years’ work experience in Operational Technology Security
* Proven experience in performing control systems risk assessments, and security awareness training for systems operators, owners and vendors
* Knowledge of operational impact analysis workshops and technical trade-off studies against SCADA, PLC and DCS architectures, and associated industrial communication protocols
* Expertise in developing OT security programs, and securing OT network architecture
* Ability to perform presales activities (e.g. proposals, presales calls, RFP responses)
* CISSP, GICSP, CISM or CFSE/CFSP certification
* Fluent in English and at least one additional European language


**We Value**
* Ability to present technical design proposals and reports to customers and/or other senior engineering, management and government groups in clear, complete, concise and non–ambiguous terms
* Excellent presentation, written and verbal communication skills; ability to clearly communicate and have excellent consulting skills
* Ability to manage and mentor a small team of Security Consultants
* Ability to undertake and complete tasks independently, meet schedules and delivery timelines, and move swiftly from concepts and theory to action
* Ability to interact with high-profile clients
* Willingness to travel for approx. 20% of your time


 We work with clients that are related to critical infrastructure. A qualified candidate must be able to pass a screening background check.

title: Head of Strategy
description:
Welcome to SSC – Swedish Space Corporation, the perfect workplace for those passionate about technology in general and space in particular.
   

  

 Our services enable successful space projects in telecommunications, security, meteorology, positioning, research, earth observation, and other applications. With space organizations, research institutes, institutional and commercial actors as customers, we offer specialist expertise in satellite communications, space consulting services, rocket and balloon systems, flight test services, satellite propulsion systems, and much more.
   

  

**Are you fueled by a passion for people and the ambition to create an awesome workplace?**
**Are you ready to embark on an exciting journey with us to help Earth benefit from space?** 
  

  

 If you answer yes to these questions, we invite you to seize the opportunity to make a significant impact as Head of Strategy in our Commercial Function. We are looking for a dedicated strategic leader and hands-on problem solver who shares our core values of Customer passion, Care, Collaboration, Curiosity, and Courage.
   

  

 The Commercial Function spans the areas of Commercial, Strategy, Public & Governmental Affairs, Defense Affairs, Sustainability, and Marketing. You will serve as a key member of the unit working closely with colleagues within and across functions and divisions for the benefit of SSC Group.
   

  

**YOUR ROLE**
 As Head of Strategy at SSC, you will play a key role in shaping the company’s future direction and enabling the achievement of our group-wide financial targets. Reporting to the Chief Commercial Officer (CCO), you will lead the group strategy and strategic business development efforts, driving both long-term direction and short-term impact.
   

  

 You will act as a strategic partner to senior leaders across divisions and functions, while also working hands-on to turn plans into actions. This is a role for someone who enjoys moving between high-level strategic thinking and operational execution – from preparing insights for the Executive Committee and Board, to facilitating and synthesizing workshops, driving processes, and implementing initiatives in close collaboration with key stakeholders.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities Will Include**
* Shaping and implementing SSC group strategy to drive profitable growth.
* Leading the annual group strategy process and supporting execution, including gathering and consolidating strategy collateral across the organization.
* Conducting internal and external analyses (market, competitors, internal company, risks) to support insight-driven decisions.
* Driving strategic work efforts and aligning group functions and divisions, across geographies.
* Collaborating with Marketing, Sales/Business Development, Product Development, and other departments to evaluate and realize new business opportunities for SSC group.
* Leading strategic projects and initiatives to support profitable growth, innovation and operational excellence as per needs basis.
* Ensuring alignment/support between the group strategy process and business planning and other key processes.
* Conducting commercial analysis including key sales/financial performance metrics and market developments in collaboration with other departments.
* Preparing and presenting strategic content and insights to Executive Committee, and other stakeholders.


 This is a broad and dynamic role that requires the ability to lead, influence and execute in a complex, international environment. You will be a key contributor to SSC’s journey and future success!
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You are a strategic thinker who enjoys rolling up your sleeves and getting things done. You thrive in cross-functional environments, and you’re not afraid to take ownership and drive initiatives from idea to implementation. With strong analytical skills and commercial and financial acumen, you’re able to see the big picture while keeping track of the details.
   

  

 You combine your structured, insight-driven mindset with excellent interpersonal skills – making you a trusted partner to leaders and teams across the organization. You know how to navigate complexity, communicate clearly, and foster collaboration.
   

  

**We Believe You Bring**
* A university degree in Business, Engineering, or a related field – or equivalent education and experience.
* +10 years experience from strategic leadership roles as well as sales or business development experience, ideally in complex international organizations.
* Solid track record of driving strategy/transformation, preferably from the space industry or related tech sectors.
* A deep understanding of strategic processes, business models, commercials and sales/financial performance indicators.
* Experience in change management, leading cross-functional initiatives and working with senior stakeholders.
* Strong problem-solving skills and a hands-on, pragmatic customer-centric approach.
* Excellent communication skills in English, both written and spoken; additional European language skills are a plus.
* A collaborative mindset, positive approach, high integrity, and a natural drive to deliver value.


**WE OFFER YOU**
* A unique opportunity to contribute to a wide range of projects and play an active role in both the Swedish and international space industry.
* An excellent opportunity for personal and career development.
* 30 days’ vacation and traditional holidays, we have extra days off.
* Wellness allowance (5,000 SEK/year)
* Attractive occupational pension (ITP) and the option to exchange salary for pension
* An international workplace that is characterized by an open atmosphere and a challenging work environment that continues to evolve.


**LOCATION** 
  

  

 This is a permanent, full-time position based in either Solna or Kiruna, Sweden.
   

  

**NEXT STEP** 
  

  

 If this opportunity sparks your interest, don’t wait - apply today! Applications are reviewed on an ongoing basis, and interviews will be conducted continuously. We kindly ask you to submit your CV when applying. While you are welcome to include a brief personal note or letter, our evaluation will primarily focus on your skills and qualifications as outlined in your CV, ensuring a fair and unbiased recruitment process.
   

  

 Please note that the job advertisement may close earlier than the stated deadline if we receive a high volume of applications. This allows us to ensure a fair and efficient recruitment process and give each application the attention it deserves.
   

  

 This is a security-classified position and will require a background check prior to employment.
   

  

**WE HELP EARTH BENEFIT FROM SPACE**
 Swedish Space Corporation (SSC) is a leading global provider of advanced space services, with more than 50 years of experience. We help space organizations, research institutes, commercial and institutional actors from all over the world to get access to space.
   

  

 With local presence on all continents and about 700 committed employees, we offer specialist expertise in satellite communications and satellite control services, spacecraft operations, rocket and balloon systems, launch services and flight test services, as well as engineering, operations and consultancy services for space missions.
   

  

 We help Earth benefit from Space.

title: Technical Product Owner - API Governance Team, Solna/Hybrid
company_industry: Transportation, Logistics, Supply Chain and Storage
description:
**Join us in shaping the future of API management at PostNord!**
 The API Governance team plays a central role at PostNord, managing multi-cloud and hybrid API Gateway platforms. Our platform enables product teams across the organization to deploy independent software solutions as APIs, seamlessly integrating them into the API gateway. This allows internal and external consumers to efficiently discover, access, and utilize these APIs through a developer portal.
   

  

 With the growing demand for APIs—from customers (e-tailers), partners (TA partners), recipients, and PostNord’s own interfaces like the PostNord app—our goal is to accelerate API integration, ensure high availability, reliability, and scalability, and continuously enhance the API gateway platform to meet evolving business needs.
   

  

 Your profile
   

  

 The API Platform team is looking for a technical Product Owner who will play a critical role to support the deployment and management of our multi-cloud API Gateway platform across AWS, Azure and on-prem. In this role, you will also be partnering with different development teams and areas to understand the API integration needs to support our unit in integrating APIs into the platform. It is important that you are a quick learner, have good communication and interpersonal skills and a passion to deliver value and high quality.
   

  

 Role & Responsibilities
   

  

* Manage the roadmap & priorities of the API Governance team of developers.
* Own product backlog that balances product team needs, product team onboarding with platform non-functional requirements.
* Stakeholder management including management on all levels, product owners, legal, finance, enterprise architects as well as external customers.
* Drive the API strategy together with the tech lead and the cloud architect (experience of working in an integration centre of excellence is a nice to have)
* Collaborate with development teams to onboard APIs into the gateway by applying different security policies.
* Support day-to-day operational activities, ensuring smooth functioning of the API gateway. It is a big plus if you have experience in e-commerce and logistics.
* Contribute to automation, observability, and infrastructure as code (IaC) initiatives.
* Handle API lifecycle management, including versioning, security, and deprecation.
* Monitor API traffic to detect anomalies such as unusual spikes, error rates, or unauthorized access patterns.
* Keep a business focused approach to API Management working with it as business asset.


**Strong Understanding Of The Following**
* Deployment, manage, and maintain the multi-cloud API Gateway platform across AWS, Azure and on-prem.
* Build and optimize CI/CD pipelines for seamless API integration and deployment.
* Monitor, troubleshoot, and optimize platform performance to ensure high availability and reliability.
* 5+ years of proven Product Ownership experience
* 5+ years IT experience with at least 3 years working experience with Cloud technologies (AWS or Azure)
* Sound knowledge of networking, firewalls and security aspects.
* Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools (Grafana, ELK Stack).
* Solid understanding of REST APIs, authentication mechanisms, API gateways and API security best practices.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work with cross-functional teams and support API integration and operational needs.
* Experience with Agile methodologies and tools like Jira/Confluence, Miro etc.


 We Believe You Are a Person That Is
   

  

* Thorough, analytical, and quick to learn
* Driven by new challenges
* Inclusive, structured, and responsible in your working style
* Able to handle stressful situations and prioritize tasks independently
* Feeling strong ownership for your delivery and your team
* Communicative and easy to collaborate with, building and nurturing long-term relationships


 We offer you
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer a variety of work in an international environment with constantly new challenges and quick decisions. Here you have opportunities to develop creative solutions and work in a prestige-free group where we jointly help to reach our goals. PostNord is one of Sweden's largest workplaces and we offer safe employment conditions and benefits. In addition to the benefits mentioned above, we offer:
   

  

* Hybrid workplace with a Nordic and dynamic environment. Watch the video about our office.
* Great development opportunities
* Great insurance and occupational pension terms
* Wellness allowance & opportunity to train at Arken's gym and indoor swimming pool
* Employee benefits through PostNord Plus - PostNord´s own personnel foundation


 We make everyday life easier
   

  

 PostNord is the leading supplier of communication and logistics solutions to, from, and within the Nordic region. We ensure the provision of a postal service to households and businesses in Sweden and Denmark. We aim to make everyday life easier and more sustainable for everyone who lives and works in the Nordic region. We are in a constant transformation and work consistently to develop both our offer and our employees, all to achieve our vision of being The favorite carrier of the Nordics. We are PostNord - a fantastic company to work and grow with. Read more at postnord.com
